Class BaseServlet

java.lang.Object

      javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet

All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
Direct Known Subclasses:
CategoryServlet, Classifier, DashboardServlet, ReportServlet, StatusServlet, Utilities
public class BaseServlet
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet

A class that holds all global objects and is extended by all servlets.

Version:
Jul 25, 2012
Author:
hewong

Method Detail

completeResponse

protected void completeResponse(java.io.PrintWriter pw,
                                javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
A function that appends HTML closing tags to PrintWriter object.

Parameters:
pw - PrintWriter object passed from servlet
response - HttpServletResponse passed from servlet

prepareResponse

protected java.io.PrintWriter prepareResponse(java.lang.String title,
                                              java.io.PrintWriter pw,
                                              javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet servlet,
                                              javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                              javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
                                       throws javax.servlet.ServletException,
                                              java.io.IOException
A function that prepends a chunk of HTML code (opening tags, static file includes) to each page.

Parameters:
title - page title in meta tag
pw - PrintWriter object
servlet - HttpServlet object used for ResourceHandler to include templates
request - HttpServletRequest object
response - HttpServletResponse object
Returns:
PrintWriter object
Throws:
javax.servlet.ServletException
java.io.IOException - if any included templates do not exist or cannot be opened

setDebugMode

private void setDebugMode(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
Turn debug mode on and off by adding ?debug=1 or ?debug=0 as url parameter

Parameters:
request - HTTP request that contains debug parameter
